sentences.en: According to saying, accident reason is DNS domain name analytic breakdown.
sentences.cn: 据称, 事故原因是DNS域名解析故障.

sentences.en: Better standardization of analytic methods between laboratories must be accomplished before existing conflicts are resolved.
sentences.cn: 只有使实验室之间的分析方法更加标准化,才能解决存在的分歧.

sentences.en: By close comparison and analytic study, he finally arrive at the truth.
sentences.cn: 他通过仔细比较和分析研究, 终于得知真相.

sentences.en: For the most part, these same forces have been a boon, so far, to Americans who have a good education and exceptional creative talents or analytic skills.
sentences.cn: 而对于那些受到良好教育，具有特殊的创新能力或分析技能的人们来说，同样的情况在很大程度上是一种恩惠。
他有一个善于分析的头脑。

sentences.en: In this section, we will consider the rank of Aa from an analytic point of view.
sentences.cn: 这一节中, 我们将从解析的观点,来考虑Aα的秩.

sentences.en: Its advantages include low analytic limitation, high accuracy and excellent stability.
sentences.cn: 改进后方法具有检测限低 、 准确度高、稳定性好等优点.

sentences.en: Latin is a synthetic language, while English is analytic.
sentences.cn: 拉丁文是一种综合性语言, 而英语是一种分析性语言.

sentences.en: Let us place ourselves at the two extremes of the analytic experience.
sentences.cn: 让我们将自己放置在精神分析经验的两个极端.

sentences.en: Once we have, through analytic meditation, come to an insight or deeper understanding, then we should cease our analysis and begin the practice of "calm abiding.
sentences.cn: 一旦我们通过分析冥想获得了洞察力和更深的理解，那么我们应该停止分析，转而开始练习“平静持久”。

sentences.en: One or more analytic Methods : Were correctly applied to the problem.
sentences.cn: 研究问题的分析使用了一种(或以上)的分析方法.

sentences.en: Other mathematicians attacked analytic methods in harsher language.
sentences.cn: 别的数学家用比较粗鲁的语言攻击分析方法.

sentences.en: Quantity and space both play a role in analytic geometry, differential geometry, and algebraic geometry.
sentences.cn: 数量和空间在解析几何，微分几何和代数几何中都发挥作用。
分析的方法就是辩证的方法.

sentences.en: The boy has an analytic mind.
The fuller development of the parallelism was to lead to analytic geometry.
sentences.cn: 这种平行性的进一步发扬便导致了解析几何的产生.

sentences.en: There are certain advantages claimed by proponents of an analytic inertical system.
sentences.cn: 解析式惯性系统的倡议者认为这种系统具有某些优点.

sentences.en: This sort of procedure is analytic in nature.
sentences.cn: 这种方法从本质上讲是分析性的.

sentences.en: Uses graphic analytic method to find the eigenvalues of heat conduction equations.
sentences.cn: 摘要采用图解分析法求出热传导方程的特征值.

words.tran_cn: 分析的；解析的；善于分析的
分析者；精神分析医师；分解者
